node.excerpt:
A few improvements starting this week. We have a better recording device now.
Also we will be putting up links to the books/resources covered. Resources The Noonday Demon by Andrew Solomon Blood, Sweat, and Pixels: The Triumphant, Turbulent Stories…
We lost our recording for day 1. Sorry @vipul @deepankar @pravj :(

A hello world. We have been meaning to archive our internal reading club discussions. This is a
pilot day for that. Since this our first time with recordings, you might find awkward silences and
transitions and general lack of audio and projection…
